entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inheritance margin doesn't work well with screen scaling #74035
    17.12
  • `GeneratorDriver.GetRunResult()` should not throw #74033
    17.11
  • Consider having generators run automatically (when in balanced mode) when a particular SG file is open in the editor. #74031
    17.12
  • Add fixer when for `params` span overloads are used with Expression selected #74030
  • Source Generators referencing nuget packages cannot be debugged in VS #74027
  • Visual Basic double to integer conversion tests stopped working in .NET 9 Preview 5 #74026

Closed

  • Test LanguageServerCleansUpOnUnexpectedJsonRpcDisconnectAsync failed in CI #73977
  • Clicking 'rerun generator' prevent future edits into the regular text buffer. #74032
  • Public API for partial properties #73411
  • Invalid CS0648 for generic partial struct with IEquatable base type redundantly specified in both parts #40538
  • Link in docs/contributing/README.md should work. #74005
  • Overlapped icons in inheritance margin #73615

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix move static members when destination is in the same file #74037
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add LanguageServer.Protocol.Test.Utilities.csproj #74036
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure an empty run result doesn't throw when generators are present. #74034
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Add brokered service for Hot Reload in VS Code: GenericHotReloadAgentManagerService #74029
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update to .NET 9 Preview 5 #74028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #74024
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async

Merged

  • Fix flaky test: LanguageServerCleansUpOnUnexpectedJsonRpcDisconnectAsync #73997
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include wrapping options in editorconfig formatting options #73938
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump razor to include fix for project serialization #74021
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix link in docs #74022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74025
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74023
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review

Updated

  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable end-to-end binding and emit for basic scenarios involving instance extension members. #74012
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Do not treat text as json when passed to api that explicit says it is not #74019
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support navigating to an interceptor location when on an intercepted method call. #74006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose 5 more things to Razor cohosting #73781
  • Emit extension marker method as public #73994
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2475319 #73982
    auto-merge
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
